entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being a long way away in a far-off country.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is also mentioned as being a long way away in a far-off country.

entities.name: he
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, referred to as 'he', is determined that there will be no goodbyes and explanations.

relationships.description: Ron and Hermione are separated from the protagonist, who feels as though he has parted from them long ago.
The protagonist is determined that there will be no goodbyes and explanations with Ron.
The protagonist is also determined that there will be no goodbyes and explanations with Hermione.
